DOC.brief_summary: Collecting information regarding adverse events from patients on treatment with anastrazole with early stage breast cancer
DOC.brief_title: Electronic Study for Anastrozole Pharmacovigilance Evaluation
DOC.criteria: Postmenopausal Early Invasive Breast Cancer Patients who are under anastrazole treatment, who have normal renal and hepatic functions. Metastatic breast cancer patients, previous hormonal therapy, other malignancies.
